data.name: A Hero's Rest Demo
data.short_description: Immerse yourself into a fantasy world as the proprietor of a small town in a world abounding with Heroes and monsters. Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options and manage your resources wisely while making sure to ward off the dangers that surround the land of Felonia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible with 2GB of RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K @ 3.60GHz equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible with 4GB of RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
